languages.text: {n}Челюсти рыжеволосого перестают двигаться. На грубо вытесанном лице трудно читать эмоции, но вам чудится удивление.{/n} "Фенрис йольда, смертн{mf|ый|ая}. Ты знаешь старые слова, славные слова. Крепкие, словно камень. Острые, как лезвие силовой секиры. Опасные, как зуб кракена". {n}Несмотря на жуткую внешность и вполне подходящий ему хриплый бас завзятого убийцы, мужчина демонстрирует удивительную склонность к поэтичным эпитетам.{/n}

{n}The red-haired giant's jaws stop their work. Emotions are hard to read on the crudely hewn face, but you think you have surprised him.{/n} "Fenrys hjolda, mortal. You know the old words. Good words. Strong as a rock. Sharp as the blade of a force axe. Deadly as a kraken's tooth." {n}The words are spoken in the guttural rasp of an inveterate killer — wholly in keeping with the man's formidable appearance — but you did not expect him to slip into poetic epithets so readily.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Челюсти рыжеволосого перестают двигаться. На грубо вытесанном лице трудно читать эмоции, но вам чудится удивление.{/n} "Фенрис йольда, смертн{mf|ый|ая}. Ты знаешь старые слова, славные слова. Крепкие, словно камень. Острые, как лезвие силовой секиры. Опасные, как зуб кракена". {n}Несмотря на жуткую внешность и вполне подходящий ему хриплый бас завзятого убийцы, мужчина демонстрирует удивительную склонность к поэтичным эпитетам.{/n}

traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}这位红发巨人停止了咀嚼。尽管他粗犷的脸上很难看出流露着什么情绪，但在你看来，你的话让他吃了一惊。{/n}“芬里斯生生不息，凡人。你听说过这些老话，它们都是好话。像岩石一样坚固，像力场斧的利刃一样锋利，像海怪的牙齿一样致命。”{n}他说这些话的时候，语气就像一个不折不扣的杀手，这与这个人可怕的外表非常相符。不过令你意外的是，他的遣词造句居然带着修辞的意味。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The red-haired giant's jaws stop their work. Emotions are hard to read on the crudely hewn face, but you think you have surprised him.{/n} "Fenrys hjolda, mortal. You know the old words. Good words. Strong as a rock. Sharp as the blade of a force axe. Deadly as a kraken's tooth." {n}The words are spoken in the guttural rasp of an inveterate killer — wholly in keeping with the man's formidable appearance — but you did not expect him to slip into poetic epithets so readily.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这位红发巨人停止了咀嚼。尽管他粗犷的脸上很难看出流露着什么情绪，但在你看来，你的话让他吃了一惊。{/n}“芬里斯生生不息，凡人。你听说过这些老话，它们都是好话。像岩石一样坚固，像力场斧的利刃一样锋利，像海怪的牙齿一样致命。”{n}他说这些话的时候，语气就像一个不折不扣的杀手，这与这个人可怕的外表非常相符。不过令你意外的是，他的遣词造句居然带着修辞的意味。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}赤髪の巨人は噛む作業を中断した。荒々しい顔から感情を読み取るのは難しいが、恐らく彼を驚かせたのだろう。{/n}「フェンリス・ヒョルダ、人間だ。あんたは古語を知ってるのか。岩のように強固でフォースアックスのように鋭く、クラーケンの歯のように恐ろしい良い言葉だ」{n}手練れの風貌にふさわしい、殺しを生業とする人物が発するしゃがれた声だが、これほどすらすらと詩的に話せるとは思いもしなかった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The red-haired giant's jaws stop their work. Emotions are hard to read on the crudely hewn face, but you think you have surprised him.{/n} "Fenrys hjolda, mortal. You know the old words. Good words. Strong as a rock. Sharp as the blade of a force axe. Deadly as a kraken's tooth." {n}The words are spoken in the guttural rasp of an inveterate killer — wholly in keeping with the man's formidable appearance — but you did not expect him to slip into poetic epithets so readily.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}赤髪の巨人は噛む作業を中断した。荒々しい顔から感情を読み取るのは難しいが、恐らく彼を驚かせたのだろう。{/n}「フェンリス・ヒョルダ、人間だ。あんたは古語を知ってるのか。岩のように強固でフォースアックスのように鋭く、クラーケンの歯のように恐ろしい良い言葉だ」{n}手練れの風貌にふさわしい、殺しを生業とする人物が発するしゃがれた声だが、これほどすらすらと詩的に話せるとは思いもしなかった。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}Las mandíbulas del gigante pelirrojo se detienen. Aunque cuesta leer las emociones de su arisco rostro, crees que le has sorprendido.{/n} «Fenrys hjolda, mortal. Conoce las antiguas palabras. Son buenas palabras. Fueres como una roca. Afiladas como la hoja de un hacha de fuerza. Letales como el diente de un kraken». {n}Pronuncia estas palabras con la voz ronca y gutural de un asesino consumado, algo completamente acorde a su formidable aspecto. Sin embargo, no esperabas un lenguaje tan florido.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The red-haired giant's jaws stop their work. Emotions are hard to read on the crudely hewn face, but you think you have surprised him.{/n} "Fenrys hjolda, mortal. You know the old words. Good words. Strong as a rock. Sharp as the blade of a force axe. Deadly as a kraken's tooth." {n}The words are spoken in the guttural rasp of an inveterate killer — wholly in keeping with the man's formidable appearance — but you did not expect him to slip into poetic epithets so readily.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Las mandíbulas del gigante pelirrojo se detienen. Aunque cuesta leer las emociones de su arisco rostro, crees que le has sorprendido.{/n} «Fenrys hjolda, mortal. Conoce las antiguas palabras. Son buenas palabras. Fueres como una roca. Afiladas como la hoja de un hacha de fuerza. Letales como el diente de un kraken». {n}Pronuncia estas palabras con la voz ronca y gutural de un asesino consumado, algo completamente acorde a su formidable aspecto. Sin embargo, no esperabas un lenguaje tan florido.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}Les mâchoires du géant roux interrompent leur mastication. Il est difficile de déceler la moindre émotion sur ce visage aux traits grossiers, mais vous pensez l'avoir surpris.{/n} « Fenrys hjolda, {mf|mortel|mortelle}. Vous connaissez les mots anciens. De bons mots. Solides comme la pierre. Aiguisés comme la lame d'une hache de force. Mortels comme la dent d'un kraken. » {n}Sa voix gutturale, exactement ce que l'on attendrait d'un tueur invétéré, est parfaitement en accord avec son apparence plus que redoutable. En revanche, jamais vous n'auriez imaginé qu'il vous déclamerait des épithètes poétiques de la sorte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The red-haired giant's jaws stop their work. Emotions are hard to read on the crudely hewn face, but you think you have surprised him.{/n} "Fenrys hjolda, mortal. You know the old words. Good words. Strong as a rock. Sharp as the blade of a force axe. Deadly as a kraken's tooth." {n}The words are spoken in the guttural rasp of an inveterate killer — wholly in keeping with the man's formidable appearance — but you did not expect him to slip into poetic epithets so readily.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les mâchoires du géant roux interrompent leur mastication. Il est difficile de déceler la moindre émotion sur ce visage aux traits grossiers, mais vous pensez l'avoir surpris.{/n} « Fenrys hjolda, {mf|mortel|mortelle}. Vous connaissez les mots anciens. De bons mots. Solides comme la pierre. Aiguisés comme la lame d'une hache de force. Mortels comme la dent d'un kraken. » {n}Sa voix gutturale, exactement ce que l'on attendrait d'un tueur invétéré, est parfaitement en accord avec son apparence plus que redoutable. En revanche, jamais vous n'auriez imaginé qu'il vous déclamerait des épithètes poétiques de la sorte.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}Die Kiefer des rothaarigen Riesen halten ein. Emotionen sind in dem groben Gesicht schwer zu deuten, aber du denkst, du hast ihn überrascht.{/n} "Fenrys hjolda, {mf|Sterblicher|Sterbliche}. Ihr kennt die alten Worte. Gute Worte. Stark wie ein Fels. Scharf wie die Klinge einer Psiaxt. Tödlich wie ein Krakenzahn." {n}Die Worte klingen kehlig und heiser, wie es einem unverbesserlichen Killer geziemt – was auch völlig zu dem beeindruckenden Äußeren des Mannes passt – aber die Lockerheit, mit der er in Poesie verfällt, überrascht dich.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The red-haired giant's jaws stop their work. Emotions are hard to read on the crudely hewn face, but you think you have surprised him.{/n} "Fenrys hjolda, mortal. You know the old words. Good words. Strong as a rock. Sharp as the blade of a force axe. Deadly as a kraken's tooth." {n}The words are spoken in the guttural rasp of an inveterate killer — wholly in keeping with the man's formidable appearance — but you did not expect him to slip into poetic epithets so readily.{/n}

Emotionen sind in dem groben Gesicht schwer zu deuten, aber du denkst, du hast ihn überrascht.{/n} "Fenrys hjolda, {mf|Sterblicher|Sterbliche}. Ihr kennt die alten Worte. Gute Worte. Stark wie ein Fels. Scharf wie die Klinge einer Psiaxt. Tödlich wie ein Krakenzahn." {n}Die Worte klingen kehlig und heiser, wie es einem unverbesserlichen Killer geziemt – was auch völlig zu dem beeindruckenden Äußeren des Mannes passt – aber die Lockerheit, mit der er in Poesie verfällt, überrascht dich.{/n}

languages.original_text: {n}The red-haired giant's jaws stop their work. Emotions are hard to read on the crudely hewn face, but you think you have surprised him.{/n} "Fenrys hjolda, mortal. You know the old words. Good words. Strong as a rock. Sharp as the blade of a force axe. Deadly as a kraken's tooth." {n}The words are spoken in the guttural rasp of an inveterate killer — wholly in keeping with the man's formidable appearance — but you did not expect him to slip into poetic epithets so readily.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kızıl saçlı devin çenesi, kıpırdamayı kesiyor. Kabaca yontulmuş yüzünden duygularını okumak zor ancak onu şaşırttığını düşünüyorsun.{/n} "Fenrys hjolda fâni. Eski sözleri biliyorsun. Kaya gibi sert, güç baltasının bıçağı gibi keskin, krakenin dişi gibi ölümcül o güzel sözler." {n}Adamın heybetli görünümüne uyan bu sözler; bir ölüm makinesine yaraşırcasına, gırtlaktan gelen kulak tırmalayıcı bir sesle çıkıyor. Böyle şaire sözler söyleyebilmesine şaşırıyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The red-haired giant's jaws stop their work. Emotions are hard to read on the crudely hewn face, but you think you have surprised him.{/n} "Fenrys hjolda, mortal. You know the old words. Good words. Strong as a rock. Sharp as the blade of a force axe. Deadly as a kraken's tooth." {n}The words are spoken in the guttural rasp of an inveterate killer — wholly in keeping with the man's formidable appearance — but you did not expect him to slip into poetic epithets so readily.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kızıl saçlı devin çenesi kıpırdamayı kesiyor. Kabaca yontulmuş yüzünden duygularını okumak zor ancak onu şaşırttığını düşünüyorsun.{/n} "Fenrys hjolda fâni. Eski sözleri biliyorsun. Kaya gibi güçlü, kudret baltasının bıçağı gibi keskin, krakenin dişi gibi ölümcül o güzel sözler..." {n}Adamın heybetli görünümüyle tamamen uyumlu sözler, bir öldürme müptelasına yaraşırcasına gırtlaktan gelen kulak tırmalayıcı bir sesle çıkıyor. Ancak ondan bu kadar kolaylıkla şairane sözler dökülmesi seni şaşırtıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison
